nodes.text: Krix Swiftshadow was a human male that lived during the Galactic Civil War.

Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, a Human male by the name of Krix Swiftshadow was present on the Blackguard, an Imperial-class Star Destroyer that was captured by the rogue Imperial Captain—and self-proclaimed Grand Admiral—Andal Sait. Sait had the intention of selling the vessel to the criminal organization Black Sun, of which Swiftshadow himself was a member. However, before these plans could come to fruition, a team of spacers boarded the Star Destroyer, and killed Swiftshadow after an intense battle against him and nine Stormtrooper Grenadiers loyal to Andal Sait.
